texto: and in relation to the needs and expectations of interested parties. a Items outlined in levels 3 to 5 are intended to be a progression of thought that is based on the guidance provided in the applicable subclause. b This may include recognition of aspects where the organization is partially meeting a maturity level. --`,,,``,`,`,`,`,`````,,-`-``,```,,,`--- 46  Copyright International Organization for Standardization ﻿ Order Number: 02315644 © ISO 2018 – All rights reserved Provided by IHS Markit under license with AENOR Sold to:UCSI UNIVERSITY [700166E00243] - SALESOFSTANDARD@SIRIM.MY, No reproduction or networking permitted without license from IHS Not for Resale,2021-05-17.09:27:29 UTC
